76023.「ここは 三門の関所です。\n この門の向こうには 勇者姫アンルシアさまが\n:
This is the Three Way Gate. Beyond this gate is Gran
Zedora Castle, where Hero Princess Anlucia resides.

76024.「ここは 三門の関所だ。\n この扉から出て コニウェア平原を抜けると\n ココ:
This is the Three Way Gate. If you exit through this
gate and go through Coniware Plain, you will reach
Cocolata Beach.

76025.「この グランゼドーラ王国への門は 常に\n すべての者たちのために 開放されて:
The gates to Gran Zedora Kingdom are always open
to all.

76026.「レンダーシアには グランゼドーラ王国の他に\n メルサンディ村 セレドの町 そ:
In Lendersia, in addition to Gran Zedora Kingdom, are 3 towns called Melsandy Village, the town of Celed, and Arahaghiro Kingdom.
All of which are peaceful and beautiful. If you have business in any of these 3 towns, you can go out through this door.
